title: Accessibility consulting creates community economic opportunity
description: Accessibility consulting creates community economic opportunity
content:
Scenario: Accessibility consulting creates community economic opportunity
    Given Alex has deep expertise in accessibility and universal design
    And organizations need guidance to improve accessibility
    When Alex provides accessibility consulting
    Then this skilled professional work should be appropriately compensated
    And the community_elohim should facilitate connecting Alex to consulting opportunities
    And care tokens should reflect the value of Alex's expertise
    And accessibility work should be recognized as economic contribution
    And the protocol should support disabled people's economic participation
    And Alex's knowledge should create income opportunities
    And community should pay fairly for disability expertise
